## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (41.0, -82.0)) which is currently out of fuel and has a warning that the chest at drop position is full.
- Wooden chest (position (41.5, -80.5)) which contains coal and is in normal status.

### Furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (-15.0, -50.0)) which is currently working and processing iron ore.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when the burner mining drill is out of fuel
- Ensure that the burner mining drill is adequately fueled before attempting to extract resources. Check the inventory of the wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) to ensure it is not full.

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Make sure to monitor the status of the furnace to ensure it is operational before inserting items. If the furnace is not working, check for fuel availability.

### Errors related to inventory management
- Regularly check the wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5) to prevent it from becoming full, which can hinder the operation of the burner mining drill.

## NAMESPACE

### Utility Functions
- No utility functions have been defined or invoked in the current execution steps.

### Important Variables
- `wood`: int
- `coal`: int
- `iron-ore`: int
- `iron-plate`: int
